title: 2 Chainz, Big Bank & DJ Scream - DO YOU CARE??
itunes:title: 2 Chainz, Big Bank & DJ Scream - DO YOU CARE??
description:
Love, toxic mindsets and goons are a few of the topics BIG BANK and DJ SCREAM chop it up about on the new episode of BIG FACTS.

2 Chainz joins the BIG FACTS crew to discuss his VERZUZ battle, his forthcoming album SO HELP ME GOD, lawsuits, and more!
